content: fisher © lindsey felice 2011 fisher © lindsey felice 2011 size adult- medium average adult head finished measurements circumference unstretched 16 inches will stretch comfortably to 24 inches materials aussi wool oasisyarn com 100% premium australian wool 200 yd per 100 g skein color ww51 sensuous grey 1 skein 1 set of 4 us #7/4 5 mm double-point needles or 1 16-inch us #7/4 5 mm circular needle optional notions required- cable needle tapestry needle stitch marker gauge 23 sts/27 row= 4 in stockinette stitch pattern using the long tail method co 100 sts onto the circular needle or divide between 3 dpn place marker and join to begin working in the round being careful not to twist cable ribbing round 1 k2 p2 k4 p2 repeat rounds 2-­5 repeat round 1 round 6 k2 p2 sl next 2 sts onto cable needle leaving needle in front of work k2 k 2 sts from cable needle p2 repeat repeat rounds 1-­6 two more times repeat only rounds 1-­5 one more time next round purl all sts fisher © lindsey felice 2011 hat body knit straight for 20 rounds decreasing round 1-­ k8 k2tog repeat round 2-­ knit all sts round 3 k7 k2tog repeat round 4 knit all sts round 5 k6 k2tog repeat round 6 knit all sts round 7 k5 k2tog repeat round 8 knit all sts round 9 k4 k2tog repeat round 10 knit all sts round 11 k3 k2tog repeat round 12 knit all sts round 13 k2 k2tog repeat round 14 knit all sts round 15 k1 k2tog repeat break yarn and draw through remaining sts pull tight finishing weave in ends on ws block if needed fisher © lindsey felice 2011 fisher © lindsey felice 2011
